com.gmail.lepeska.martin.udplib.datagrams

Class ADatagram

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gmail.lepeska.martin.udplib.datagrams.ADatagram
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AccessRequestDatagram, AccessResponseDatagram, ExploreRequest, ExploreResponse, FileShareBinaryPart, FileShareFinish, FileSharePartRequest, FileShareTextPart, IsAliveDatagram, MessageDatagram, UserDeadDatagram, UserInfoDatagram

    public abstract class ADatagram
extends java.lang.Object
    Every type of Datagram has its own class, however all are using either text or binary data representation. DATAGRAM CONTENT(bytes): DATAGRAM_HEADER + DATAGRAM TYPE + MESSAGE/DATA MESSAGE CONTENT(string): value1#value2#value3...
